### About me

* Extensive experience in software engineering (13+ years)
* Broad and deep vision in architecture and code data structures & algorithms
* Efficient, scalable, and sustainable systems design
* Data science and predictive ML models for data-driven decisions
* Leadership and mentoring
* Constant learner
